description: Edit existing object using object name or uid.

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: Send JSON object to use the API Web Services

headers.name: X-chkp-sid
headers.description: Session unique identifier as it returned by the login request

body.name: protocol
body.description: Protocol that communicates with the certificate authority. Available only if "automatically-enroll-certificate" parameter is set to true.

body.name: retrieve-crl-from-http-servers
body.description: Whether to retrieve Certificate Revocation List from http servers.

body.name: retrieve-crl-from-ldap-servers
body.description: Whether to retrieve Certificate Revocation List from ldap servers.

body.name: cache-crl
body.description: Cache Certificate Revocation List on the Security Gateway.

body.name: crl-cache-method
body.description: Weather to retrieve new Certificate Revocation List after the certificate expires or after a fixed period.

body.name: crl-cache-timeout
body.description: When to fetch new Certificate Revocation List (in minutes).

body.name: allow-certificates-from-branches
body.description: Allow only certificates from listed branches.

success.name: name
success.description: Object name. Must be unique in the domain.

success.name: protocol
success.description: Protocol that communicates with the certificate authority. Available only if "automatically-enroll-certificate" parameter is set to true.

success.name: retrieve-crl-from-http-servers
success.description: Whether to retrieve Certificate Revocation List from http servers.

success.name: retrieve-crl-from-ldap-servers
success.description: Whether to retrieve Certificate Revocation List from ldap servers.

success.name: cache-crl
success.description: Cache Certificate Revocation List on the Security Gateway.

success.name: crl-cache-method
success.description: Weather to retrieve new Certificate Revocation List after the certificate expires or after a fixed period.

success.name: crl-cache-timeout
success.description: When to fetch new Certificate Revocation List (in minutes).

success.name: allow-certificates-from-branches
success.description: Allow only certificates from listed branches.

success.name: branches
success.description: Branches to allow certificates from. Required only if "allow-certificates-from-branches" set to "true".

success.name: tags
success.description: Collection of tag objects identified by the name or UID.

failure.name: current-session
failure.description: Validation related to the current session.

failure.name: current-session
failure.description: Validation related to the current session.

failure.name: current-session
failure.description: Validation related to the current session.

set opsec-trusted-ca-with-automatic-enro.description: Set opsec trusted ca with automatic enrollment
